Name: short_desc
Description: a brief description of the parameter

Name: extra_desc
Description: additional, more detailed, description of the parameter

Name: context
Description: context required to set the parameter's value (see below)

Name: vartype
Description: parameter type (bool, enum, integer, real, or string)

Name: source
Description: source of the current parameter value

Name: min_val
Description: minimum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values)

Name: max_val
Description: maximum allowed value of the parameter (null for non-numeric values)

Name: enumvals
Description: allowed values of an enum parameter (null for non-enum values)

Name: boot_val
Description: parameter value assumed at server startup if the parameter is not otherwise set

Name: reset_val
Description: value that reset would reset the parameter to in the current session

Name: sourcefile
Description: configuration file the current value was set in (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a non-superuser); helpful when using include directives in configuration files

Name: sourceline
Description: line number within the configuration file the current value was set at (null for values set from sources other than configuration files, or when examined by a non-superuser)

Name: pending_restart
Description: true if the value has been changed in the configuration file but needs a restart; or false otherwise.
